ygData.subject: RE: Finding a Flute
ygData.msgSnippet: Ugh!  I wish you were on Innoruuk - I would come help you.  Get one of the local oger/trolls to kill some lizards and use one of those flutes.  Not sure if any
ygData.messageBody:
Ugh! I wish you were on Innoruuk - I would come help you. Get one of the
local oger/trolls to kill some lizards and use one of those flutes. Not
sure if any are sold in Ogg or Feer - prolly only if a hunter sold one to a
merch. You can get them from the gypsy merchants in Rathe Mts just past the
Inns on the way to the Lake Rathe zone.

CT is not a good place for level 19/20 - unless you work the courtyard and
are ready to zone fast. And the Maze is a bad place period. High 30's and
even 40's can get agro'd and have a pack of lizzie on them in no time - not
to mention getting lost. I hate that maze!

Your best bet is to try to find a high level player to help you CR. When I
went there in my high 20's and low 30's stuff would see me. My invis,
other's invis, my bad luck - whatever - stuff would see me. So, it's gonna
be real tough for you to try to drag your self out - unless you are close
and know the maze. Get a map.
http://www.nx.sakura.ne.jp/~chizuya/index2e.html
<http://www.nx.sakura.ne.jp/~chizuya/index2e.html> scroll down and look at
cazic and the link to the maze map.

Good Luck!

Sylly


-----Original Message-----
From: Peck White [mailto:peck_white@...]
Sent: Friday, January 14, 2000 10:02 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Finding a Flute

From: Peck White <peck_white@...>

Well, I went to Cazic Thule for the first time last
night at 3/4 of a bubble to go to get to level 20. I
went because one of my guildmates wanted me to go with
him. We got ourselves bound just inside Ogguk and
then proceeded to Cazic. To make a long story short I
now have a whole bub to go to get to 20 and my body is
somewhere in the maze.

What I want to know is...

Where can I buy a wind instrument in Feerrot or Ogguk?


I've already died once on my first attempt at a CR due
to the Camo that I had dropping just as a train went
by. I trust my own song more than someone elses
spell.

Thanks in advance,

Tomerrilin
Mithaniel Marr Server
